lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic began his pursuit of the only grand slam title missing from his collection with a no-nonsense 6-4 6-1 6-1 win over Taiwan's Lu Yen-hsun in the French Open first round on Tuesday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic began his pursuit of the only grand slam title missing from his collection with a no-nonsense 6-4 6-1 6-1 win over Taiwan's Lu Yen-hsun in the French Open first round on Tuesday....

headline.main: Djokovic Downs Lu in a Hurry to Reach Round Two
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Downs Lu in a Hurry to Reach Round Two
